extendedInfo.description: This is the WiFi Only version of the Notify Lite application.Don't miss what matters most, get notified!This application will display a popup notification window when certain phone/app events occur.This app is extremely customizable with many options. Updates and new features are frequently added.Features including:Popup Window Notifications for:â¢ Calendar Events/Remindersâ¢ K-9 Mail Clients (Kaiten Mail, K-9 Mail, K-9 Mail For Pure)â¢ Gmail (Pro version only)â¢ AquaMail (Pro version only)â¢ Twitter Notifications (Pro version only)â¢ Facebook Notifications (Pro version only)â¢ Google Voice Notifications (Pro version only)â¢ More full featured notification options are in the works as well!Customizable features:â¢ Themesâ¢ Customize Contacts (Pro version only)â¢ Quiet Time Feature (Pro version only)â¢ Blacklist Feature (Pro version only)â¢ and many more...Region features:â¢ Supported in multiple languages (Chinese, English, French, German, Hebrew, Hungarian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Ukrainian)â¢ Region Specific Display OptionsVisit MeGoogle+: https://plus.google.com/106330578986972156117Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/DroidNotifyTwitter: https://twitter.com/DroidNotifyAppApp Online ResourcesAn outline of the application preferences can be found here: http://code.google.com/p/droid-notify/wiki/ApplicationPreferencesDevelopment Website: http://code.google.com/p/droid-notify/Note: If you run into any problems with this app, please visit the FAQ pages at http://code.google.com/p/droid-notify/wiki/FAQ, or email me at droidnotify@gmail.com.Keywords: talk google voice whatsapp twitter facebook k-9 email gmail missed call calendar messages mms sms popup pop up pop-up toast toaster alert banner notification notify notifier display dialog status feedback screen metro windows phone wp7 iphone ios htc sony xperia froyo gingerbread honeycomb holo ics ice cream sandwich

reviews.title: No Thanks!!
reviews.comment: Let me get this straight!  So If i want all the available features on both my phone and tablet, I need to purchase 4 separate apps totalling \302\2438? I thought notify+ would have unlocked all features for both phone and tablet,  but obviously that\'s not the case. So therefore in that case, No thanks!
reviews.author: Dillon Pike
